name: Dispelling Slice
summary: Your sneak attack slices through the threads binding magic to a target.
description: Your sneak attack slices through the threads binding magic to a target. Make a Strike against a flat-footed creature. If your Strike deals sneak attack damage, you attempt to counteract a single spell active on the target (your choice).
